name: Spinnerotchi: The spin of your dream
name_original: Spinnerotchi: The spin of your dream
description:
Have you ever wanted to get a fidget spinner, but you didn't want to waste money on it?
CONGRATULATIONS, MAH BOI COS IN DIS GAME YOU SPIN, FEED THIS STUPID THING FOR FREE!

You can play some knockoff fidget-games, you can feed it, throw it around, get incurable diseases and have some fun!
This game was made for "So bad it's good" jam. Check other entries, if this wasn't bad/good/stupid enough for you.
